Package com.BrethrenAce.GameUtilities

Class BoardUtils

java.lang.Object
com.BrethrenAce.GameUtilities.BoardUtils
public class BoardUtils
extends java.lang.Object
Various quality of life utilities for coding, mainly string assignments to bind numbers so that we don't have to manually put numbers every time and risk build failure when updating them. Resourced from Black Widow Chess engine Author: Brethren de la Gente Date: 2021-01-07

  • Method Details

    • pieceInstanceCreator

      public static Piece pieceInstanceCreator​(java.lang.String pieceRankName, Player owner, Alliance alliance)
      Creates Piece instance of the passed in piece rank and alliance.
      Parameters:
      pieceRankName - name or rank of the piece to be created.
      owner - Player reference who will own the piece.
      alliance - Alliance of the piece.
      Returns:
      the Piece created. Null unsuccessful.
